thought: The Slack action parameters are not yet implemented. I need to set the parameters to send a simple text message to the Slack channel named 'news' with the text content from the input data's json 'text' field.
plan: Set 'select' parameter to 'channel' to send message to a channel.
Set 'channelId' parameter with mode 'name' and value 'news' to specify the Slack channel.
Set 'messageType' to 'text' for a simple text message.
Set 'text' parameter to '={{$json["text"]}}' to use the text from input data.
Test the Slack message sending action to verify the message is posted correctly.
criticism: If the Slack channel name is incorrect or the bot lacks permissions, the message sending will fail. Also, the message text must be correctly passed from the workflow.

tool_input.comments: Send a simple text message to Slack channel #news with the message text from input data.
